entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:33 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:33 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
